item.description:
Duxbury Conservation Lands Thursday Sept 6, 9:00 AM, 5 to 6 mile hike through Duxbury conservation lands including North Hill Marsh, Round Pond, Bay Circuit Trail and Audubon Sanctuary. Highlights include cranberry bogs, ponds, moderate hills and paths through forest cover.

No dogs please since a significant part of this hike is over Audubon land where dogs are not allowed.

Directions: Take exit 10 off Route 3. Go 1.8 miles on 3A North and turn left on Mayflower St. Go 1.2 miles to North Hill Marsh parking lot on right.

Leader Bill McDonald 508-942-3800 (Cell).

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday hiking club- North Hill Marsh Wildlife Sanctuary
